metadata.title: CVE-2020-7769 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
This affects the package nodemailer before 6.4.16. Use of crafted recipient email addresses may result in arbitrary command flag injection in sendmail transport for sending mails.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7769` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-nodemailer - 6.4.16-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-nodemailer package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.4.16-1').
